name: The Splitter
description:
<Submission for Game Maker's Toolkit GameJam June 13 2021

You're The Splitter, a slime of sorts that has fused 2 energies together and keeps them at a balance, Yin and Yang, Black and White, Darkness and Light.

!!Use them to solve puzzles and get through the game!!

Each of your halves can walk through the opposite color of it's own (Yin (Black) can walk through white but can stand on black. Yang (White) can walk through black but can stand on white)

Controls:

  • A/S / Arrow left / Arrow Right - Movement
  • Space / W/ Up Arrow -  Jump
  • E / F / Numpad 0 / Control - Split (into 2)
  • Tab / Numpad Enter - Switch which character you're controlling 

SPOILER (Controls but a spoiler)

  • Q / Numpad 1 - Teleport call 

Please Note (known bugs):   

  1. There are some bugs still in the game, primarily with some collision after you've used teleport on the 2 guys. I couldn't get those fixed in time for submission. 
  2. Additionally, the splitting and merging is a little visually glitchy but mechanically functional.
  3. The camera doesn't stick to white after initial split, requires switching to controlling black and then back to white for it to function and follow character properly.
  4. Lastly, the game has no 'end', only a 'game over' if you let your 'balance' run out.
